title: Sex?
body:
Clickbait baby :)
But on a serious note add me ingame for fun games involving group skins and we can play together such as SKT, SSW, Heartseeker etc..
- Arcade Fortune

replies.body:
Add me and i will singlehandedly be the guy that always picks the rival skin group and ruins your themes.

Im a bunch of laughs trust me.

Like this one time, this bloke fed on my team and i fucking killed his dog, it was hilarious everyone just stood there with their mouths gaping but i knew they were laughing inside.
